Package be.helha.ttmc.model

Class BasicCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.helha.ttmc.model.BasicCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class BasicCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class meant to containt all the questions present on a card. that the player will be interacting with.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Giorgio CACULLI LA196672, Guillaume LAMBERT LA198116, Tanguy TAMINIAU LA199566
    See Also:
    Question, Serialized Form
